The cons would be you could potentially drop your saddle bag down in to your tire. You could wear away or damage the dropper posts stanchion. Your dropper post may be slow to rise , if it rises at all with a loaded saddle bag. Or it could be completely fine, not have any negative effects and you actually enjoy having a using a dropper post while bikepacking.
